channel.title: KethiumX - 'A new World'
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]KethiumX[/b][/size]
[b]KethiumX is a Runescape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Made by our Development Team for players, KethiumX aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it's players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team. KethiumX has alot of features, Incluiding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, PvMing and alot more! Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest news about the server! KethiumX focuses on player satisfaction, with daily updates and a large amount of content already available! Some of the features of KethiumX are: All skills are available for you to train! Lots of monsters to kill for loot! Custom content like minigames! Looting other players in PvP! These are just some of the features of KethiumX.[/b]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2e55af6.jpg[/img] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/KethiumX.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/KethiumX.jar[/url] [url=http://kethiumx.tk]http://kethiumx.tk[/url] [url=http://kethiumx.tk/Play_Now.html]http://kethiumx.tk/Play_Now.html[/url]
Tutorial In the beginning you will be presented with a beginning Tutorial which will show you around!
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/5vvdax.jpg[/img]
Point System At KethiumX we have a Server-Points-System, which you can obtain by killing certains Bosses around the World of KethiunX!
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/swtyyo.jpg[/img]
Prestige System At KethiumX, we have a prestige system. When you're bored or maxed so you can just prestige and win/get some very wonderful items!
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/w214zq.jpg[/img]
Dungeoneering And here we have our Dungeoneering, with a very beautiful shop interface and also with a good Dungeoneering system, it is custom and different!
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/fz3dk2.jpg[/img]
Construction Here we have construction, you can buy your own house for 30M coins or if you can not afford, so you can just train your Construction skill at Sawmill's area!
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/28jfczp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/313reie.jpg[/img]
Dashboard Here we have our dashboard, you can almost access to everything here.
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2lvjud2.jpg[/img]
Thieving At KethiumX we make sure that people do not just auto-click the stalls to get money, here you will get a spear for each click, and you will thus receive damage(s)!
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2s18adt.jpg[/img]
Question System Here you can answer the Questions, by typing ;;asnwer (your answer). And you will thus receive Rewards!
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/23lmrma.jpg[/img]
Cystal Chest From this Crystal Chest you can make Money, and by opening this one you will need a crystal key, and you can get Crystal key halves by killing a monster, and then you just have to put both together.
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/s118co.jpg[/img]
Gambling At KethiumX you'll also get the possibility to Dice or Play Flower Games, the Dicebag is only for doantors.
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2r5suc5.jpg[/img]
Raptor And here we have the good things that almost all you will like, here we have Raptor with around 8 Custom bosses, there will be also added more later.
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/521eme.jpg[/img]
[/center]

item.title: KethiumX - 'A new World'
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Looks very nice.

Read full topic

item.title: KethiumX - 'A new World'
item.dc:creator: @Engineer Engineer
item.description:
@Engineer wrote:

[center][size=18pt]KethiumX[/size]

KethiumX is a Runescape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Made by our Development Team for players, KethiumX aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it’s players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team. KethiumX has alot of features, Incluiding Minigames, Quests, Skilling, Pking, PvMing and alot more! Please stay up with our community forums to keep up with the latest news about the server! KethiumX focuses on player satisfaction, with daily updates and a large amount of content already available! Some of the features of KethiumX are: All skills are available for you to train! Lots of monsters to kill for loot! Custom content like minigames! Looting other players in PvP! These are just some of the features of KethiumX.


https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/KethiumX.jar
http://kethiumx.tk
http://kethiumx.tk/Play_Now.html

Tutorial
In the beginning you will be
presented with a beginning Tutorial which will show you around!

Point System
At KethiumX we have a Server-Points-System,
which you can obtain by killing certains Bosses
around the World of KethiunX!

Prestige System
At KethiumX, we have a prestige system.
When you’re bored or maxed so you can just
prestige and win/get some very wonderful items!

Dungeoneering
And here we have our Dungeoneering,
with a very beautiful shop interface and also with a good
Dungeoneering system, it is custom and different!

Construction
Here we have construction,
you can buy your own house for 30M coins or
if you can not afford, so you can just train your
Construction skill at Sawmill’s area!


Dashboard
Here we have our dashboard,
you can almost access to everything here.

Thieving
At KethiumX we make sure that people do not just auto-click the stalls to get money,
here you will get a spear for each click, and you will thus receive damage(s)!

Question System
Here you can answer the Questions, by typing ;;asnwer (your answer).
And you will thus receive Rewards!

Cystal Chest
From this Crystal Chest you can make Money,
and by opening this one you will need a crystal key,
and you can get Crystal key halves by killing a monster,
and then you just have to put both together.

Gambling
At KethiumX you’ll also get the possibility to
Dice or Play Flower Games,
the Dicebag is only for doantors.

Raptor
And here we have the good things that almost all you will like,
here we have Raptor with around 8 Custom bosses,
there will be also added more later.

[/center]
